main blog & twitter: sadieannerue instagram: dailymackcast, andimackpapercraneproject

summary: can we do the paper planes please? I would tell everybody but I don't have that many followers, we need someone who is big so...
question: can we do the paper planes please? I would tell everybody but I don't have that many followers, we need someone who is big so you and let's find someone else
answer:
paper cranes*

idk man. like i said, if enough people showed interest in doing a physical campaign to get andi mack renewed: i will personally fold 1,000 paper cranes to send to gary marsh and i would write reasons and names on the wings of the cranes. like i would do it just for fun because i like making paper cranes tbh. 

i’ve had a few people message me about it but not really enough to like Start A Campaign.

if i had an extra $20 to blow on origami paper right now i would just go ahead and start making the cranes but unfortunately: i am poor lmao

this wasn’t my original idea but i am willing to help make it happen so if there are people interested in doing a “renew andi mack” campaign in which i send 1,000 paper cranes to disney channel (because 1,000 are supposed to grant your wish) then let me know?? i could probably make more than 1,000 but i would want to start with that unit just to be sure lol.

like i’ve said, i’m mostly content with just getting three seasons but if anyone out there wants to try to get a renewal then idk, communicate your thoughts/ideas to me i guess???

body:
I tried to make a French joke with T.J’s name from Josh’s French baguette spoiler, but then I realised that it’d be J.T not T.J.

I thought of Je T'aime.

It doesn’t work with his name, though. Or if I do this?

Tje Jt'aime?

This makes no sense. Thanks for coming to my TEDtalk.

summary: What crackship do you think is most likely to be canon?
question: What crackship do you think is most likely to be canon?
answer:
I’m still not even sure what qualifies as a crackship to y’all anymore and what doesn’t. 

But I think, if it were possible (which it is not), I could see them giving Ambi a Korrasami-style ending tbh. Like if they weren’t already having to fight for one gay ship, that would have potential lmao.

summary: You’re allowed to disagree with Josh but please don’t send him rude asks Keep in mind he’s just a kid and nobody wants to read...
body:
You’re allowed to disagree with Josh but please don’t send him rude asks

Keep in mind he’s just a kid and nobody wants to read negative stuff all the time and if you feel inclined to tell him your take on something he’s said it’s not hard to do it respectfully

summary: Lol Luke as a reincarnation of your Eric Osborne love is funny. Let's hope Andi Mack doesn't screw up Tyrus in its brief...
question: Lol Luke as a reincarnation of your Eric Osborne love is funny. Let's hope Andi Mack doesn't screw up Tyrus in its brief official scene in 3x21 as much as Disgrassi did with Triles. They had so much potential in 'Thunderstruck' (love the music in the rain) then turned it into something so toxic and damaging to bi guys in season 14. Also lol everyone mad that we got to wait 21 episode between the look back and Tyrus cannoning, Degrassi had 40x eps between setting up up Triles and 'Thundersrtruck'
answer:
That’s one of the good things about Andi Mack potentially ending with season 3. They aren’t going to have time to fuck up Tyrus after it endgames. We aren’t going to have to see them fighting or breaking up or any of the other drama we see with the het ships. We may very well just get a happy ending which is really important as that doesn’t happen often with LGBTQ+ couples on TV.

As for Degrassi, I really think they meant well. I think they did a very good job at Triles in the beginning, and I think they actually ended Triles very well. I’ve talked about before how dramatic and intense the beginning of that relationship felt, and it was actually a good thing. The way they ended, with Tristan finally learning to put his own well-being before his love life, and Miles being forced to take care of himself instead of someone else, was very special. And the fact that they left it kind of open ended, so that viewers could decide for themselves whether or not they think the couple would get back together was very nice. They only really messed it up in the middle there, especially during seasons 1-2 of Next Class. But I think they kind of messed up everything during those two seasons tbh. Maya was unbearable. A lot of the other characters just felt out of place. And a big part of that is that they had to unexpectedly switch networks and change from the 40-episode format to 10-episode format. They really should have addressed the reasons for Tristan’s biphobia instead of leaving that in subtext though, as that was one of the major issues with their relationship (aside from the general toxicity of both characters). But hey nothing like a good old fashion nearly-fatal bus crash followed by a season without being able to speak to make one of the most obnoxious, problematic characters on a series slightly less obnoxious and problematic.

blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: Hi, so how do you know for certain what episodes each character will be in? For instance, you stated that Tj is in episode 11,...
question: Hi, so how do you know for certain what episodes each character will be in? For instance, you stated that Tj is in episode 11, but the episode description makes it seem like it's only going to focus on Andi, Jonah, and Buffy supporting Cyrus. I know it is possible that the description just left out Tj (which it often does) but just wondering by what reasons do you know for certain?
answer: We’ve known since September that TJ would be in the funeral ep. Luke was on set that week and we knew from our friends at yun casting that there would be a funeral. Luke’s imdb also confirms that he’s in 3x11. It’s unlikely that TJ is going to be mentioned much in ep descriptions going forward outside of big group activities
